section.title: Overview
section.para:
The scenario uses two types of mobile robotic arms that can drive and pick up objects in a maze.
The Ô¨Årst robot belongs to the C++ class LandBasedWheeled .
The second robot belongs to the C++ class LandBasedTracked.
Both classes derive from the base class LandBasedRobot.

section.title: Compiling Instructions:
section.para: Compile the program with: gcc -Wall -Wextra ReadFile.cpp gcc -Wall -Wextra ReadFile.cpp
